_sText:
Wreakz 2011 Gaming Configs
___________________________
(HDR is disabled from both configs)

Install:

1. There is 2 configs for high performance computers or for low performance computers.
2. Its about you which one you like to use, but i recommend you to use right one for your computer.
3. So first you need to copy Wreakz2011high/low.cfg and autoexec.cfg to your css config folder.
4. Your css config folder is located at Steam\SteamApps\*Your Account*\counter-strike source\cstrike\cfg\.
5. After that you are ready to go play some css!

Customize:

If you know even little bit about css commands you should go and open Wreakz2011high/low.cfg
with a text editor like notepad. There is lot of settings what you can customise and
make mine configs even better for you. I prefer you to customise crosshair and mouse settings
because i cant know which settings is best for you.


Remeber rate and give me some feedback! (:
